column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 single-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 single-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 single-column full-justified font-smallest aligned-line headchar-lower
